, on the lake surrounded by huge mountains.

Climb on the top or walk on the slopes of one of the many mountains that surround the city.
"Resegone" is easily reached from the city centre taking a bus(in front of the train station) to the funicular for the "Piani d'Erna".
Another popular mountain is the "Grignetta", renown between rock climbers for the variety and beauty of its climbing routes.

value: content=Hotel Sassi Rossi is in Valsassina near Lake Como
address=Via A. Visconti, 84. 23900 Lecco. Lecco - Lake Como
content= Overlooking Lake Como, no other location is quite as enchanting. Rooms are comfortable and many amenities are provided which make the stay extremely relaxing.
content=A beautiful Bed and Breakfast near the valley station of the Piani d'Erna cableway.  Great place for your relax moments.
